arts.sum: Arsenal will welcome Manchester City to the Emirates Stadium in a Premier League encounter on Sunday afternoon. The Gunners have accumulated nine points from four games in the Premier League and will be coming into this game off the back of a 2-0 victory over Athletic Club in the Champions League. arts.ttl: Pep Guardiola says there's one thing Arsenal just don't do anymore, it's incredible
Pep Guardiola relives the recent rout at the Emirates Stadium
arts.sum: ‚ÄúThe game last season we started like it happened many times last season, an Under-14 team, we gave away a thousand million goals.‚Äù Three more losses followed in the FA Cup and Premier League in the 2022/23 campaign, but the title-challenging campaign carried more seeds of optimism for Arsenal against an all-conquering unit.

arts.ttl: Pep Guardiola makes brutally honest Mikel Arteta admission ahead of Arsenal vs Man City
arts.sum: Manchester City will be looking to make amends for last season's humiliation at the hands of Arsenal when they travel to the Emirates Stadium to face the Gunners

arts.ttl: Mikel Arteta could now make one change for Arsenal vs Man City to completely ruin Erling Haaland's game
Mikel Arteta believes ‚Äòwithout a doubt‚Äô that Man City are challengers for the Premier League
arts.sum: Man City might have lost two of their first four fixtures in the Premier League and not be the same force of the past, but Mikel Arteta admitted that they are in the title race "without doubt" alongside Arsenal . The last twelve months have been tricky for Pep. He failed to win a trophy for the first time since his debut campaign with the Citizens, losing the Premier League title after four years and stumbling to third place despite a spending spree in January.
